subject: Web3
title: Celebrity NFT Disasters
description: Learn Celebrity NFT Disasters in one minute.

hook.text: Dozens of celebrities launched NFT projects. Most crashed, and some landed the stars in legal trouble.

buildup.text: Floyd Mayweather, DJ Khaled, and Paris Hilton promoted NFTs to millions of followers.

discovery.text: The SEC investigated undisclosed payments. Celebrities were paid to promote projects without telling fans.

twist.text: Many celebrity collections lost 90% or more of their value within months of launching.

climax.text: The backlash taught the market a lesson: celebrity attachment doesn't mean quality or lasting value.

punchline.text: Famous faces couldn't save bad NFT projects.

quiz.question: Why did many celebrity NFT projects fail?
options: They were hype-driven with no real value or utility
